name: ITER8
description:
ITER8 (or 'iterate') was created for the "Make it count" game jam. You must collect all of the gems on each level, but to do so you can only make one short flight path (so make it count!) which will loop forever. Levels increase in difficulty. The first 8 levels are set in a low-poly earth environment, the last 8 levels are in space.

All content was created in the Game Jam timeframe (except font). See readme for details

Created by Lincoln Margison of LMGNStudios.com
